description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Bluetooth driver information disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2024-38123):

1. Download and apply the KB5041571 update from the official Windows Update catalog.
2. Restart your system after the installation to ensure changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update resolves the information disclosure aspect associated with out-of-bounds read vulnerabilities.
- For manual installation, download the update package from: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running Windows 11 Version 24H2.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
